title: Retro font. Please help
content:
Hey everyone. I have come across this lovely retro style typeface several times before, always wondering what it might be. Maybe someone here can help. I would really appreciate it

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [slab.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091112224306/http:/typophile.com/files/Bildschirmfoto%202009-10-11%20um%2011.20.00.png) | 32.37 KB |
author: robinbaral

comments.content:
58Rodeo is closer. Itâ€™s based on an old typeface called Hellenic Wide which has come up often here. One old FontBank version is called Hefty, and Jason Walcott has made a newer, up-to-date font for Veer, called [Hellenic Wide Complete](http://web.archive.org/web/20091112224306/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000096).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks a lot for your help guys!
